languages.text: Если персонаж является {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}ассасином культа смерти{/g}, то при получении уровня {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряного благословения{/g} он также получает +10 к Выносливости на 2 раунда. Эффект не суммируется.
languages.original_text: If worn by a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, when the wearer is affected by {g|ib:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g}, they gain +10 Toughness for 2 rounds. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Если персонаж является ассасином культа смерти, когда на него действует {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}кровавый фиал{/g}, он получает +10 к Выносливости на 2 раунда. Эффект не суммируется.
Если персонаж является ассасином культа смерти, когда на него действует {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}кровавый фиал{/g}, он получает +10 к Выносливости на 2 раунда. Эффект не суммируется.

languages.text: If worn by a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, when the wearer gains {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}, they also gain +10 Toughness for 2 rounds. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: If worn by a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, when the wearer gains {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}, they also gain +10 Toughness for 2 rounds. Does not stack.

languages.text: If worn by a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, when the wearer gains a stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}, they also gain +10 Toughness for 2 rounds. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: If the wearer is the Death Cult assassin, when affected by {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}Blood Phial{/g}., they gain +10 Toughness for 2 rounds. Does not stack.
If the wearer is the Death Cult assassin, when affected by blood phial, they gain +10 Toughness for 2 rounds. Does not stack.
If the wearer is the Death Cult assassin, when affected by blood phial, they gain +10 Toughness for 2 rounds. Does not stack.
If worn by a Death Cult assassin, when the wearer is affected by {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g}, they gain +10 Toughness for 2 rounds. Does not stack.

If worn by a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, when the wearer is affected by {g|ib:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g}, they gain +10 Toughness for 2 rounds. Does not stack.

languages.text: Si lo lleva un {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}asesino del Culto de la Muerte{/g}, cuando el portador gana una acumulación de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecidos por la sangre{/g}, también gana +10 de Resistencia durante 2 asaltos. Este efecto no es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: If worn by a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, when the wearer gains a stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}, they also gain +10 Toughness for 2 rounds. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Si lo lleva un {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}asesino del Culto de la Muerte{/g}, cuando el portador gana una acumulación de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecidos por la sangre{/g}, también gana +10 de Resistencia durante 2 asaltos. Este efecto no es acumulativo.

languages.text: {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}デスカルト・アサシン{/g}が装備した場合、使用者が{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}のスタックを得ると、2ラウンドの間、耐久力 +10を獲得する。この効果はスタックしない。
languages.original_text: If worn by a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, when the wearer gains a stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}, they also gain +10 Toughness for 2 rounds. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}デスカルト・アサシン{/g}が装備した場合、使用者が{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}のスタックを得ると、2ラウンドの間、耐久力 +10を獲得する。この効果はスタックしない。

languages.text: 当这件装备被{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}拜死教刺客{/g}装备时，每当装备者获得{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}效果时，坚韧提高10点，持续两轮。此效果不可叠加。
languages.original_text: If worn by a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, when the wearer gains a stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}, they also gain +10 Toughness for 2 rounds. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 当这件装备被{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}拜死教刺客{/g}装备时，每当装备者获得{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}效果时，坚韧提高10点，持续两轮。此效果不可叠加。

languages.text: Si le porteur est un {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}assassin du culte de la mort{/g}, il gagne un bonus de +10 à l'Endurance pendant 2 rounds chaque fois qu'il reçoit un cumul de l'effet {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g}. Non cumulable.
languages.original_text: If worn by a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, when the wearer gains a stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}, they also gain +10 Toughness for 2 rounds. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Si le porteur est un {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}assassin du culte de la mort{/g}, il gagne un bonus de +10 à l'Endurance pendant 2 rounds chaque fois qu'il reçoit un cumul de l'effet {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g}. Non cumulable.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger ein {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Todeskult-Assassine{/g} ist und einen Stapel {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Blutsegen{/g} erhält, steigt auch seine Zähigkeit für 2 Runden um +10. Kann nicht gestapelt werden.
languages.original_text: If worn by a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, when the wearer gains a stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}, they also gain +10 Toughness for 2 rounds. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger ein {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Todeskult-Assassine{/g} ist und einen Stapel {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Blutsegen{/g} erhält, steigt auch seine Zähigkeit für 2 Runden um +10. Kann nicht gestapelt werden.

languages.text: Bir {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Ölüm Tarikatı suikastçısı{/g} tarafından takılıyorsa takan kişi, {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}kanla vaftiz{/g} birikimi kazandığında aynı zamanda da +10 Dayanıklılık kazanır. Etkisi 2 raunt sürer. Etki üst üste birikmez.
languages.original_text: If worn by a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, when the wearer gains a stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}, they also gain +10 Toughness for 2 rounds. Does not stack.
